name: The spy who shot me™
description: The spy who shot me™ is a comedy arcade-like FPS. Served up in a 90's retro style.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.2GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 64MB Internal DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 330 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.2GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 330 MB available space
